title: Send Automated Appointment Confirmation
description: A patient schedules an appointment online. The system needs to automatically send them a confirmation.

tasks.description: Receive the new appointment data from the online scheduling portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system detects a new appointment has been booked.

tasks.description: Identify the patient's preferred communication method (email or text).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system checks the patient's preferences.

tasks.description: Automatically send a confirmation message with the appointment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patient receives an immediate confirmation of their appointment, reducing no-shows.
